author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 21-year-old unemployed youth was arrested for murdering his father in the early hours on Friday.

Chandran (62) of Ponammapet was married to Santhi and the couple has a daughter and a son. It is said that the son, Nagaraj, had gone home in an inebriated condition on Thursday. When Chandran questioned him, altercation broke between the two.

Irked, Nagaraj stabbed his father with a knife.

Chandran suffered serious injuries and was admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital where he died.

Ammapet police registered a case and arrested Nagaraj.
title: Man murders father
